forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle and patchy fog before 2pm. Cloudy, with a high near 40. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 47, with temperatures falling to around 45 in the afternoon. South wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 40. South wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: New snow! Yay! Thank you groomers for making the tough decision to put down snow well in advance of the races this coming weekend’s. It’s a tough balancing act.Tracks are deep and the dirt from yesterday is buried under the new snow. But new snow means soft snow and with the warm up tonight and rain tomorrow that means that how we leave Bucks Run today is how it will be tomorrow.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All loops are far better than they need to be for Wonderful Skiing !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are in great shape with a classic track. We will not groom today or tomorrow with the warm temperature.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Despite the temperature, there is snow in the air this morning, but stranger things have happened before. All of our runs are open today and conditions and coverage are very good. The soup of the day breaks conformity by adding blue cheese to tomato bacon soup. The lifts spin 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. today. The gate to Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. Grab your best friends and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
